services.title: Personal Care
services.description: Care and support with personal needs such as washing or showering, grooming, dressing, walking or mobility, or a companion with personal outings.
services.title_topics: We provide personalised care that is personal to you.
topics: Light housekeeping (eg. laundry, vacuuming, changing bed sheets etc)
services.helper_text: Home Instead can help with a range of personal needs while providing welcome companionship. Your care needs are individual to you and your condition. For some people, help in the home with regular visits from CAREGivers and allied healthcare professionals is beneficial while others may need specialist or palliative care to support their needs.
services.helper_tex_2: We can support with a variety of services from transport to appointments and social outings through to specialist dementia care. Home Instead can help with your capacity building and maintaining independence in your own home. We are responsive to your changing needs and can alter the amount and level of care you receive.

services.title: Companionship
services.description: We help with a range of personal and lifestyle needs, while providing a welcome and authentic companionship.

services.title: Transport

services.title: 24 Hour Care
services.description: Your Home Instead team is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to respond to any care needs or concerns.

services.title: Dementia Care
services.description: Specialist dementia relationship-based care to support and ensure the comfort and safety for those living with dementia.

services.title: Palliative Care
services.description: Personal, compassionate and supportive palliative care. A personalised layer of support aimed to improve the final stages of  those living with limiting conditions.

services.title: Respite Care
services.description: A chance to connect with someone new, and organised short or long-term respite care for you, while we give your family carer a chance to recharge, and take a break from their day-to-day routine.

services.title: Care Management
services.description: Your care manager, will help you plan, coordinate and manage all of your current as well as long term care needs.

services.title: Hospital to Home
services.description: Dedicated discharge, coordination, transport and in-home support to help ensure your transition back home to full recovery is all looked after.
